trans-unit.source: Represents objects that support synchronized input events.
trans-unit.target: Representa objetos que dão suporte a eventos de entrada sincronizados.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for input.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a escuta de entrada.

trans-unit.source: If the provider is currently listening for input, it reverts to normal operation.
trans-unit.target: Se o provedor está escutando no momento para a entrada, ele reverterá para a operação normal.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when WPF discards input.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento gerado quando o WPF descarta a entrada.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: A UI Automation provider should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de automação de interface do usuário deve usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when the input was received by an element other than the one currently listening for the input.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento gerado quando a entrada é recebida por um elemento diferente daquele que está escutando no momento para a entrada.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: A UI Automation provider should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de automação de interface do usuário deve usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when the input was received by the element currently listening for the input.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento gerado quando a entrada foi recebida pelo elemento escutando no momento para a entrada.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: A UI Automation provider should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de automação de interface do usuário deve usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>, to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos, como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>para recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Designates that the provider start listening for input of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Designa que o início do provedor aguardando a entrada do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: When WPF finds matching input, it checks the route of the incoming event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o WPF encontra correspondência de entrada, ele verifica a rota do evento de entrada.

trans-unit.source: If the automation element that is listening for the input is not in the route, the input is discarded and the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputDiscardedEvent> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o elemento de automação que está aguardando a entrada não está na rota, a entrada será descartada e o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputDiscardedEvent>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputDiscardedEvent>

trans-unit.source: If the input is received by the automation element listening for that type, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedTargetEvent> event is raised; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedOtherElementEvent> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se a entrada é recebida, o elemento de automação de escuta para o tipo, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedTargetEvent>evento é gerado; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedOtherElementEvent>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedOtherElementEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedTargetEvent>

trans-unit.source: After receiving the input, the provider stops listening and continues normally.
trans-unit.target: Depois de receber a entrada, o provedor para de escutar e continuará normalmente.

trans-unit.source: The type of input to listen for.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de entrada para ouvir.
